channel.title: Server is online but i cant play
channel.description: i portforwarded my server and made an .no-ip.biz ip. When i run the source (trisidiaXV3) its says online and when i check if my ip is online on runelocus status checker it says it also online. But when want to play my server with the .no-ip.biz ip it says error connecting to server? Is the firewall maybe the problem or something else? Please help i have no clue

item.title: Server is online but i cant play
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

No… 127.0.0.1 is like localhost
If the brother try’s to connect to the server it needs to be 127.0.0.1. The own computer is using the same ip like the other computer because its connected with the same network. Thats logic mate!

Read full topic
item.source: Server is online but i cant play

item.title: Server is online but i cant play
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:6, topic:479300”]No. Wrong

  1. If your brother is connected with your Network then he Needs to Play on 127.0.0.1 too.[/quote]

127.0.0.1 is a loop back address, if he gave the 127.0.0.1 client to his brother, his brother’s client would try connecting to it’s own computer. Not the poster’s computer.

For his brother to get on, he would have to go into ipconfig figure out what his ip is example: 192.168.1.1

compile the client for his ip then give it to his brother, Then his brother would be able to connect. Either way it should work with a no-ip unless something is being blocked.

Read full topic
item.source: Server is online but i cant play

item.title: Server is online but i cant play
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

No. Wrong

  1. If your brother is connected with your Network then he Needs to Play on 127.0.0.1 too.

  2. Change the Client ip to 127.0.0.1 to Play your Server. To get other Players connected upload a Client with your no-ip

  3. I never saw a source where you can Change the ip innit…

Read full topic

item.title: Server is online but i cant play
item.dc:creator: @Iyal1234 Iyal1234
item.description:
@Iyal1234 wrote:

if you want to play from the computer you use to run the source you have to change the no-ip to 127.0.0.1 to play your server
and copy the client make the first one with no-ip and the second one with 127.0.0.1 you play form the seconde one (127.0.0.1).

Read full topic
